actor_awards.notes: Costello received a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for Motion Pictures at 6438 Hollywood Blvd. The duo's 'Who's on First?' routine was inducted into the National Recording Registry by the Library of Congress and is ranked #91 on the AFI's 100 Years... 100 Movie Quotes.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein
filmography.role_description: A bumbling railway baggage handler who becomes the target of Dracula's scheme to replace Frankenstein's Monster's brain with a more pliable one—his own.
filmography.plot: Two freight handlers encounter Dracula, the Frankenstein Monster, and the Wolf Man while delivering crates to a house of horrors.
filmography.awards: National Film Registry: Inducted (2001); AFI: 100 Years... 100 Laughs (#56)

filmography.title: Buck Privates
filmography.role_description: A streetwise tie salesman who accidentally enlists in the army to escape a cop, only to find that the cop is his new drill sergeant.
filmography.plot: Two sidewalk salesmen enlist in the army to avoid the police, only to discover their drill instructor is the officer who tried to arrest them.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nominated – Best Original Song; Photoplay Award: Win – Best Performance

filmography.title: The Time of Their Lives
filmography.role_description: A master tinker in the Revolutionary War who is wrongly accused of treason and cursed to haunt a Danbury estate as a ghost until his innocence is proven.
filmography.plot: Two ghosts from the Revolutionary War must find a letter from George Washington to prove they were not traitors.

filmography.title: Hold That Ghost
filmography.role_description: A timid gas station attendant who inherits a run-down tavern from a gangster, only to find it apparently haunted and filled with hidden loot.
filmography.plot: Two gas station attendants inherit a gangster's rural estate and find themselves stranded in a haunted house with a group of strangers.

filmography.title: The Naughty Nineties
filmography.role_description: The bumbling lead actor on a Mississippi showboat who helps the captain reclaim his boat from crooked gamblers; features the famous 'Who's on First?' routine.
filmography.plot: A showboat captain loses his boat in a card game to a trio of crooks, and his star performers plot to win it back.
filmography.awards: AFI: 100 Years... 100 Movie Quotes ('Who's on First?' #91)

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Invisible Man
filmography.role_description: A newly licensed private investigator who poses as a champion boxer to help an invisible man clear his name of murder.
filmography.plot: Two bumbling private eyes help a boxer who has been framed for murder and has taken an invisibility serum to evade the police.
filmography.awards: Saturn Award: Nominated – Best DVD Collection (Classic Sci-Fi)

filmography.title: Who Done It?
filmography.role_description: A soda jerk who dreams of writing radio mysteries but finds himself a prime suspect when a network president is murdered during a broadcast.
filmography.plot: Two soda jerks aspiring to write radio mysteries get caught up in a real murder investigation at a radio station.

filmography.title: Little Giant
filmography.role_description: A naive country boy who travels to Los Angeles to become a vacuum cleaner salesman, facing ridicule and manipulation in a rare sympathetic role without Abbott as his partner.
filmography.plot: A farm boy takes a correspondence course in salesmanship and travels to the big city, where he unwittingly outsmarts the sharpies.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Killer, Boris Karloff
filmography.role_description: A hotel bellboy who is framed for murder and nearly driven to suicide by a mesmerizing swami.
filmography.plot: A bumbling bellboy is accused of murder at a resort hotel and tries to clear his name while dodging a mysterious swami.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
filmography.role_description: An American policeman in London who witnesses Dr. Jekyll's transformation but cannot get anyone to believe him.
filmography.plot: Two American cops in London hunt for the mysterious Mr. Hyde, unaware that he is the alter ego of the respectable Dr. Jekyll.

filmography.title: In the Navy
filmography.role_description: A baker who joins the Navy and creates chaos on the high seas while trying to impress the Andrews Sisters.
filmography.plot: A popular crooner joins the Navy to escape his fans, but a reporter follows him, and two bumbling sailors try to help.

filmography.title: Ride 'Em Cowboy
filmography.role_description: A peanut vendor at a rodeo who accidentally hides out on a train heading west and is forced to become a cowboy.
filmography.plot: Two peanut vendors at a rodeo get in trouble with their boss and hide out on a train, ending up as cowboys on a dude ranch.

filmography.title: Keep 'Em Flying
filmography.role_description: A carnival worker who joins the Army Air Corps as a ground crewman and inadvertently causes mayhem with airplanes.
filmography.plot: Two carnival workers follow a stunt pilot into the Army Air Corps, causing trouble while trying to keep him flying.

filmography.title: Pardon My Sarong
filmography.role_description: A Chicago bus driver who steals a bus and ends up on a tropical island where he is mistaken for a legendary hero.
filmography.plot: Two bus drivers drive their bus off route and end up on a tropical island, getting involved with jewel thieves and natives.

filmography.title: It Ain't Hay
filmography.role_description: A cab driver who accidentally kills a carriage horse with candy and tries to replace it with a champion racehorse.
filmography.plot: A cab driver tries to replace a friend's dead horse but accidentally steals a famous racehorse instead.

filmography.title: Lost in a Harem
filmography.role_description: A magician's prop man stranded in the Middle East who helps a deposed prince regain his throne.
filmography.plot: Two entertainers stranded in the Middle East help a prince regain his kingdom from a mesmerizing despot.

filmography.title: Here Come the Co-Eds
filmography.role_description: A caretaker at an all-girls college who gets roped into a wrestling match and a basketball game to save the school.
filmography.plot: Two caretakers at a girls' college try to save the school from foreclosure by raising money through sports.

filmography.title: The Wistful Widow of Wagon Gap
filmography.role_description: A salesman traveling west who is accused of murder and, by local law, must support the victim's formidable widow and children.
filmography.plot: A traveling salesman in the Old West is accused of killing a man and sentenced to care for the man's family.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello in Hollywood
filmography.role_description: A barber who dreams of becoming a Hollywood agent and gets mixed up with studio executives and stars.
filmography.plot: Two barbers try to become agents for a new singer but end up causing chaos at the movie studio.

filmography.title: The 30 Foot Bride of Candy Rock
filmography.role_description: Costello's only solo starring film, where he plays a rubbish collector who invents a device that turns his girlfriend into a giant.
filmography.plot: A junkman's girlfriend is turned into a 30-foot giantess by a strange radiation, and he must find a way to shrink her back to size.

filmography.title: Rio Rita
filmography.role_description: A stowaway who unwittingly uncovers a Nazi spy ring at a hotel near the Mexican border.
filmography.plot: Two bumbling stowaways discover a plot by Nazi spies to use a radio broadcast to transmit secret codes.

filmography.title: Hit the Ice
filmography.role_description: A sidewalk photographer who gets mixed up with bank robbers and chases them to a ski resort.
filmography.plot: Two photographers are mistaken for bank robbers and follow the real crooks to a winter resort to clear their names.

filmography.title: Mexican Hayride
filmography.role_description: A fugitive con man in Mexico who tries to sell fake silver mine stock while dodging the authorities.
filmography.plot: A con man fleeing the U.S. reunites with his partner in Mexico and gets involved in a fake silver mine scheme.

filmography.title: Africa Screams
filmography.role_description: A bookish clerk who poses as a great hunter to join a safari, only to be terrified by the wildlife.
filmography.plot: Two booksellers join a safari to Africa in search of diamonds, but find only trouble with animals and cannibals.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy
filmography.role_description: An American stranded in Egypt who gets caught in a three-way battle for a cursed medallion.
filmography.plot: Two Americans in Egypt get mixed up with a mummy and a cult seeking a medallion that leads to a hidden treasure.

filmography.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
filmography.role_description: A modern retelling of the fairy tale where Costello plays the childlike Jack who climbs the beanstalk to rescue a princess.
filmography.plot: Jack falls asleep while babysitting and dreams he is the Jack of the fairy tale, climbing a beanstalk to find a giant.

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Go to Mars
filmography.role_description: An orphanage handyman who accidentally launches a rocket ship and lands in New Orleans (thinking it's Mars) and then Venus.
filmography.plot: Two guys accidentally launch a rocket to Mars but land in New Orleans for Mardi Gras, then are forced to fly to Venus.
